episodes.summary: Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz and Koothrappali undertake a challenging and risky experiment-attending the Halloween party being thrown by their hot neighbor, Penny.

episodes.name: The Dumpling Paradox
episodes.summary: When Wolowitz seduces Penny's friend and takes over her apartment, Penny sleeps on Leonard and Sheldon's couch. With Wolowitz preoccupied, the guys discover they are without a fourth member of their group and in desperation, they ask Penny to join their Halo team.

episodes.name: The Grasshopper Experiment
episodes.summary: Koothrappali is overwhelmed after his parents arrange a blind date, but he discovers he actually can talk to the opposite sex after a few drinks; however, complications set in when his beautiful date is more interested in Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization
episodes.summary: When Sheldon and Leonard are invited to present their joint findings at a physics conference, Sheldon refuses, and Penny steps in to mediate, only deepening the rift between the two best friends.

episodes.name: The Loobenfeld Decay
episodes.summary: After hearing Penny sing, Leonard lies to avoid seeing her perform, but Sheldon takes it one step further with a more elaborate lie that leads to the appearance of his non-existent cousin.

episodes.name: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
episodes.summary: When Sheldon gets sick, Leonard and the boys know what's in store and avoid him like the plague, leaving an unsuspecting Penny to nurse the world's worst patient back to health.

episodes.name: The Jerusalem Duality
episodes.summary: When Leonard and Sheldon meet a 15-year-old physics prodigy, Sheldon is distraught that this boy genius is younger and smarter, so in an attempt to restore his sense of purpose, the boys come up with a solution to derail Dennis' research.

episodes.name: The Bat Jar Conjecture
episodes.summary: Since Sheldon's only focus is to prove his mental superiority while preparing for the Physics Bowl, the guys kick him off the team and enlist his nemesis Leslie Winkle.

episodes.name: The Nerdvana Annihilation
episodes.summary: When Leonard and the guys buy a time machine prop from a classic 1960 movie, its arrival creates problems for Penny and she tells the boys that their obsession with comics and toys is "pathetic".

episodes.name: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
episodes.summary: When Leonard, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali all become smitten with Sheldon's twin sister, Leonard devises a plan to eliminate his rivals, however, it backfires when Sheldon declares he will decide whom his sister dates.

episodes.name: The Peanut Reaction
episodes.summary: When Penny learns that Leonard doesn't celebrate birthdays, she attempts to throw him a surprise party, but is sidetracked by Sheldon who unexpectedly gets to live out one of his greatest fantasies at an electronics store.

episodes.name: The Tangerine Factor
episodes.summary: When Leonard asks Penny out on a date and she says yes, they each seek the "wisdom" of reluctant advisor.

episodes.name: The Bad Fish Paradigm
episodes.summary: After her first date with Leonard goes awry, Penny finds an unwilling confidant in Leonard's anti-social roommate, Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Codpiece Topology
episodes.summary: When Leonard sees Penny with a handsome new guy, he enters into a rebound relationship with Sheldon's nemesis, Leslie Winkle.

episodes.name: The Barbarian Sublimation
episodes.summary: Sheldon creates a monster when he introduces Penny to the world of online gaming.

episodes.name: The Griffin Equivalency
episodes.summary: Raj, newly famous because of an article in a magazine, gets a big head and makes a disastrous play for Leonard's crush, Penny.

episodes.name: The Euclid Alternative
episodes.summary: Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to make Sheldon confront his longstanding fear of driving.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem
episodes.summary: Young grad student's attraction to Sheldon confuses everyone, including Sheldon himself.

episodes.name: The Panty Piñata Polarization
episodes.summary: Penny vows to get revenge on Sheldon when he bans her from the apartment for a series of petty infractions.

episodes.name: The Lizard-Spock Expansion
episodes.summary: Wolowitz thinks he's found the love of his life, until she meets Leonard.

episodes.name: The White Asparagus Triangulation
episodes.summary: Sheldon can barely contain his joy when Leonard starts dating a woman who meets Sheldon's exacting standards.

episodes.name: The Vartabedian Conundrum
episodes.summary: When Leonard's relationship with a new woman starts moving too fast, he goes to Penny for advice.

episodes.name: The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis
episodes.summary: Christmas is a source of stress for Leonard - whose handsome colleague starts dating Penny - and his friends, who are being tormented by Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette.

episodes.name: The Killer Robot Instability
episodes.summary: When Penny's comment about Wolowitz's love life sends him into a depressed stupor, his friends lose their most important team-mate in an upcoming fighting robot competition.

episodes.name: The Friendship Algorithm
episodes.summary: Socially awkward Sheldon develops a scientific procedure for making friends.

episodes.name: The Financial Permeability
episodes.summary: Sheldon's "simple" solution to Penny's financial problem leads to a confrontation between Leonard and Penny's hulking ex-boyfriend, Kurt.

episodes.name: The Maternal Capacitance
episodes.summary: Disastrous visit from Mrs. Hofstadter brings Leonard and Penny closer together.

episodes.name: The Cushion Saturation
episodes.summary: Paintball game leads to a fight between Penny and Sheldon, and romance for Wolowitz and Leslie.

episodes.name: The Terminator Decoupling
episodes.summary: Train trip to San Francisco takes a major detour when Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz and Raj discover that beautiful sci-fi actress Summer Glau is onboard.

episodes.name: The Work Song Nanocluster
episodes.summary: Penny's home hair products business becomes a complete nightmare when a caffeine-addled Sheldon takes over.

episodes.name: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition
episodes.summary: Penny develops a rivalry with a sexy female neighbor who threatens to become "The New Penny" in the building.

episodes.name: The Hofstadter Isotope
episodes.summary: While a fellow comic book-loving pal of the guys romances Penny, Leonard and Wolowitz venture out into the world of "Ladies' Night" at a local bar.

episodes.name: The Vegas Renormalization
episodes.summary: Leonard and Koothrappali take a heartbroken Wolowitz to Las Vegas, leaving Sheldon locked out of his apartment and forced to bunk with Penny.

episodes.name: The Classified Materials Turbulence
episodes.summary: Things begin to look up for Leonard when Penny makes a surprising revelation on her second date with Stuart. Meanwhile, Wolowitz enlists his friends' help when he discovers a critical design flaw in his project for NASA.

episodes.name: The Monopolar Expedition
episodes.summary: Penny is conflicted when Leonard and his friends decide to spend the summer working - at the North Pole.

episodes.name: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation
episodes.summary: Sheldon flees back to Texas in disgrace when he learns the guys tampered with his arctic expedition data, forcing the guys to follow him and threatening Leonard's hopes for a romantic encounter with Penny.

episodes.name: The Jiminy Conjecture
episodes.summary: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup while Sheldon and Howard stake their best comic books on a bet to determine the species of a cricket.

episodes.name: The Gothowitz Deviation
episodes.summary: Howard and Raj visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

episodes.name: The Pirate Solution
episodes.summary: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India, but Sheldon has a solution, which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as third wheel.

episodes.name: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary
episodes.summary: While Sheldon settles a score with his nemesis, Wil Wheaton, Wolowitz begs Leonard to get Penny to set him up with one of her friends.

episodes.name: The Cornhusker Vortex
episodes.summary: Sheldon teaches Leonard how to understand football while a kite-fighting incident threatens Howard and Raj's friendship.

episodes.name: The Guitarist Amplification
episodes.summary: An argument between Leonard and Penny proves "inconvenient" to Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Adhesive Duck Deficiency
episodes.summary: With Leonard, Howard and Raj away camping in the desert, an injured Penny has only Sheldon to rely on.

episodes.name: The Vengeance Formulation
episodes.summary: After he's humiliated on National Public Radio, Sheldon vows to destroy Kripke, while Wolowitz tries not to destroy his new relationship with Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Gorilla Experiment
episodes.summary: Sheldon attempts to help Penny understand Leonard's work, and Wolowitz becomes jealous when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Maternal Congruence
episodes.summary: Visit from Leonard's mother delights Sheldon and horrifies Leonard.

episodes.name: The Psychic Vortex
episodes.summary: While Sheldon and Koothrappali attend a university mixer, Leonard is upset to discover that Penny believes in psychics.

episodes.name: The Bozeman Reaction
episodes.summary: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system.

episodes.name: The Einstein Approximation
episodes.summary: Sheldon's search for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

episodes.name: The Large Hadron Collision
episodes.summary: Leonard can only bring one guest on a trip to see CERN's Large Hadron Collider in Switzerland on Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: The Excelsior Acquisition
episodes.summary: Sheldon winds up in traffic court when he gets a ticket because of Penny.

episodes.name: The Precious Fragmentation
episodes.summary: When the guys find a ring from "The Lord of the Rings" at a garage sale, it threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: The Pants Alternative
episodes.summary: Sheldon's friends come to his aid when his fear of public speaking stands between him and a coveted award.

episodes.name: The Wheaton Recurrence
episodes.summary: Fight between Leonard and Penny threatens their relationship, while Sheldon battles Wil Wheaton in bowling.

episodes.name: The Spaghetti Catalyst
episodes.summary: When Leonard and Penny aren't speaking, Sheldon goes to extremes to keep them both happy.

episodes.name: The Plimpton Stimulation
episodes.summary: Leonard and Sheldon compete for the attention of a famous female physicist.

episodes.name: The Staircase Implementation
episodes.summary: Leonard tells Penny about how he met Sheldon for the first time...and what happened to the elevator.

episodes.name: The Lunar Excitation
episodes.summary: While Penny worries that dating Leonard has ruined her for normal guys, Wolowitz and Koothrappali search for Sheldon's perfect match online.

episodes.name: The Robotic Manipulation
episodes.summary: Penny finds herself along for the ride on Sheldon's first date ever; while Wolowitz finds a new use for a robotic arm.

episodes.name: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification
episodes.summary: Sheldon realizes he won't live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, and attempts to extend his lifespan.

episodes.name: The Zazzy Substitution
episodes.summary: The guys are concerned as Sheldon searches for an alternative to human companionship.

episodes.name: The Hot Troll Deviation
episodes.summary: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitz's comes to light, while Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

episodes.name: The Desperation Emanation
episodes.summary: Leonard realizes he's the only one without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his.

episodes.name: The Irish Pub Formulation
episodes.summary: Leonard keeps an affair secret from Sheldon, Howard and Raj.

episodes.name: The Apology Insufficiency
episodes.summary: Sheldon's answers during an FBI interview put Wolowitz's security clearance in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The 21-Second Excitation
episodes.summary: While the guys camp in line for a screening, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

episodes.name: The Boyfriend Complexity
episodes.summary: Penny asks Leonard to lie to her father, while Howard, Raj and Bernadette pull an all-nighter at a telescope.

episodes.name: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis
episodes.summary: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Penny's ex, while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.

episodes.name: The Justice League Recombination
episodes.summary: The guys find a "super" use for Penny's new boyfriend, Zack, when they enter a costume contest as the Justice League.

episodes.name: The Bus Pants Utilization
episodes.summary: Leonard's idea for a smartphone app derails his friendship with Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Love Car Displacement
episodes.summary: Tension runs high when everyone is staying at the same hotel for a science event and Bernadette runs into her ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Thespian Catalyst
episodes.summary: Sheldon hopes acting lessons from Penny will help him become a better teacher. Meanwhile, Koothrappali fantasizes about his best friend's girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Benefactor Factor
episodes.summary: Wealthy donor to the university makes Leonard consider how far he's willing to go for the sake of science.

episodes.name: The Cohabitation Formulation
episodes.summary: As Wolowitz contemplates taking things with Bernadette to the next level, Leonard rekindles his relationship with Raj's sister.

episodes.name: The Toast Derivation
episodes.summary: Sheldon struggles to cope when he realizes it's actually Leonard who is the center of their social group.

episodes.name: The Prestidigitation Approximation
episodes.summary: Leonard must choose between new girlfriend Priya and his friendship with Penny. Meanwhile, Howard drives Sheldon crazy with a magic trick.

episodes.name: The Zarnecki Incursion
episodes.summary: When someone hacks Sheldon's online game account, the guys go on a quest to find the culprit.

episodes.name: The Herb Garden Germination
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy experiment on their friends by spreading gossip, while Howard takes a big step in his relationship with Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Agreement Dissection
episodes.summary: When Priya uses her lawyer skills to pick apart the roommate agreement, the girls take Sheldon dancing.

episodes.name: The Wildebeest Implementation
episodes.summary: Raj attempts to cure his social anxiety disorder while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Engagement Reaction
episodes.summary: When Howard finally breaks the news to his mom that he's engaged to Bernadette, it lands her in the hospital.

episodes.name: The Roommate Transmogrification
episodes.summary: When Bernadette receives her Ph.D., the guys take joy in reminding an emasculated Wolowitz that he is the only one in their group who isn't a doctor. Meanwhile, Koothrappali becomes Sheldon's new roommate after hearing Leonard and Priya engaging in a "Star Trek" bedroom fantasy.

episodes.name: The Skank Reflex Analysis
episodes.summary: Penny worries that she's screwed things up permanently with her friends, while Sheldon takes command of the paintball team.

episodes.name: The Infestation Hypothesis
episodes.summary: Fight between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya.

episodes.name: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation
episodes.summary: Leonard and Amy get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst
episodes.summary: Raj finally meets a girl he can communicate with.

episodes.name: The Russian Rocket Reaction
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a party at Wil Wheaton's house, and Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity.

episodes.name: The Rhinitis Revelation
episodes.summary: Sheldon competes with the gang for his mother's attention when she comes to visit.

episodes.name: The Good Guy Fluctuation
episodes.summary: Cute comic book artist puts Leonard and Priya's relationship to the test, while Sheldon tries to scare the guys for Halloween.

episodes.name: The Isolation Permutation
episodes.summary: Amy is crushed when Bernadette and Penny go shopping for wedding dresses without her.

episodes.name: The Ornithophobia Diffusion
episodes.summary: Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, and Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

episodes.name: The Flaming Spittoon Acquisition
episodes.summary: Sheldon considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

episodes.name: The Speckerman Recurrence
episodes.summary: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor.

episodes.name: The Shiny Trinket Maneuver
episodes.summary: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy when he isn't impressed by her recent accomplishment, and Howard must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

episodes.name: The Recombination Hypothesis
episodes.summary: Everything might change when Leonard offers Penny a spur of the moment invitation to a romantic dinner for two.

episodes.name: The Beta Test Initiation
episodes.summary: Leonard and Penny experiment with dating, while Raj develops a peculiar relationship with his phone's virtual assistant.

episodes.name: The Friendship Contraction
episodes.summary: Sheldon's selfish demands force Leonard to reconsider their friendship. Meanwhile, Wolowitz tries to pick his astronaut nickname.

episodes.name: The Vacation Solution
episodes.summary: When Sheldon is forced to take his vacation, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab. Meanwhile, Bernadette wants Howard to sign a pre-nup.

episodes.name: The Rothman Disintegration
episodes.summary: When an office at the University opens up, Sheldon must compete for it with his archenemy, Kripke. Meanwhile, a gift from Amy makes Penny uncomfortable.

episodes.name: The Werewolf Transformation
episodes.summary: Sheldon's life is turned upside-down after his barber gets sick. Meanwhile, astronaut training causes Wolowitz to rethink his decision to go into space.

episodes.name: The Weekend Vortex
episodes.summary: Sheldon chooses to play video games with the guys rather than go with Amy to her aunt's birthday party.

episodes.name: The Transporter Malfunction
episodes.summary: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon "Star Trek" collectibles as a thank-you, leading Sheldon to be haunted by Mr. Spock. Meanwhile, Raj decides he has met the "Future Mrs. Koothrappali" after his parents set him up on a date.

episodes.name: The Hawking Excitation
episodes.summary: When Wolowitz gets to work with Stephen Hawking, Sheldon is willing to do anything to meet his hero.

episodes.name: The Stag Convergence
episodes.summary: Bernadette reconsiders marrying Howard after learning about his sexual history.

episodes.name: The Launch Acceleration
episodes.summary: Reschedules Howard's mission, putting the wedding plans in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Leonard says something surprising to Penny in the bedroom.

episodes.name: The Countdown Reflection
episodes.summary: When Howard and Bernadette decide they want to be married before his NASA launch, the gang rushes to put on a wedding.

episodes.name: The Date Night Variable
episodes.summary: With his friends on dates, Raj must face his loneliness. Also, Wolowitz is caught in an argument between Bernadette and his mom, even while he's in space.

episodes.name: The Decoupling Fluctuation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard, he tries to intervene. Meanwhile, in space, the other astronauts pick on Howard.

episodes.name: The Higgs Boson Observation
episodes.summary: Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, and the pressure of being in space takes its toll on Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Re-Entry Minimization
episodes.summary: When Wolowitz returns from space, he doesn't get the hero's welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

episodes.name: The Holographic Excitation
episodes.summary: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart's comic book store. Meanwhile, Leonard seduces Penny with science.

episodes.name: The Extract Obliteration
episodes.summary: Sheldon's relationship with Stephen Hawking is threatened over a game of "Words with Friends," and Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

episodes.name: The Habitation Configuration
episodes.summary: Wolowitz struggles with moving out of his mother's house. Meanwhile, Sheldon is caught in the middle of an argument between Amy and Wil Wheaton.

episodes.name: The 43 Peculiarity
episodes.summary: Howard and Raj try to get to the bottom of why Sheldon disappears every afternoon at 2:45. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny deal with jealousy in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Parking Spot Escalation
episodes.summary: When the University reassigns Sheldon's parking spot to Wolowitz, their fight affects the whole gang.

episodes.name: The Fish Guts Displacement
episodes.summary: Sheldon tries to nurse a sick Amy back to health, while Wolowitz prepares for an upcoming fishing trip with his father-in-law.

episodes.name: The Santa Simulation
episodes.summary: Sheldon revisits some Christmas memories during a game of Dungeons and Dragons, while Penny, Bernadette and Amy try to find a girl for Koothrappali when he joins the girls for ladies' night.

episodes.name: The Egg Salad Equivalency
episodes.summary: Sheldon gets accused of sexual harassment at the University and winds up getting Leonard, Raj and Wolowitz in trouble.

episodes.name: The Bakersfield Expedition
episodes.summary: While the guys take a road trip to a comic book convention dressed as "Star Trek: The Next Generation" characters, the girls stay home and try to interpret a comic book.

episodes.name: The Cooper/Kripke Inversion
episodes.summary: Sheldon is forced to work with Barry Kripke and faces a crisis of confidence. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj spend $1,000 on action figures of themselves.

episodes.name: The Spoiler Alert Segmentation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon and Leonard fight, it affects Penny and Amy's living arrangements. Meanwhile, Raj takes care of Mrs. Wolowitz while Howard is away.

episodes.name: The Tangible Affection Proof
episodes.summary: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine's Day, Raj and Stuart throw a "lonely people" party at the comic book store.

episodes.name: The Monster Isolation
episodes.summary: After a terrible date, Koothrappali vows to never leave his apartment. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

episodes.name: The Contractual Obligation Implementation
episodes.summary: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz speak to junior high girls about careers in science. Meanwhile, Koothrappali plans a date with Lucy.

episodes.name: The Closet Reconfiguration
episodes.summary: Howard struggles with whether or not he should open a letter from his father, and Leonard and Penny throw a "grown-up" cocktail party at the apartment.

episodes.name: The Tenure Turbulence
episodes.summary: Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University, and the competition heats up when the girls get involved.

episodes.name: The Closure Alternative
episodes.summary: Sheldon feels lost after one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon and Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure. Meanwhile, Raj discovers a secret about his new love interest, Lucy.

episodes.name: The Proton Resurgence
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Leonard hire Professor Proton, the host of their favorite childhood TV show, to perform. Also, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble babysitting Raj's dog.

episodes.name: The Love Spell Potential
episodes.summary: When the girls' trip to Vegas falls through, the guys invite them to play Dungeons & Dragons, causing Sheldon and Amy's relationship to take an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Koothrappali and Lucy go on a very awkward date.

episodes.name: The Bon Voyage Reaction
episodes.summary: New success for Leonard makes Sheldon very jealous and throws Penny for a loop. Meanwhile, Koothrappali pushes Lucy too far in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Hofstadter Insufficiency
episodes.summary: With Leonard away, Sheldon and Penny spend quality time together sharing intimate secrets. Also, Wolowitz helps Raj get over his ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Deception Verification
episodes.summary: Leonard's friendship with Sheldon is put to the test when he returns from the North Sea. Meanwhile, Wolowitz's relationship with his mother causes an unusual threat to his masculinity.

episodes.name: The Scavenger Vortex
episodes.summary: When the entire gang competes in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj, it brings out the best - and worst - in everyone.

episodes.name: The Raiders Minimization
episodes.summary: Sheldon seeks revenge after Amy ruins one of his favorite movies. Meanwhile, Leonard discovers a way to get Penny to do anything, and Raj and Stuart create online dating profiles.

episodes.name: The Workplace Proximity
episodes.summary: Sheldon must decide how much "Amy time" is too much after she takes a job at his university. Meanwhile, Howard finds himself sleeping on Raj's couch after a fight with Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Romance Resonance
episodes.summary: Sheldon's major scientific breakthrough makes him feel like a fraud. Meanwhile, Howard's romantic gesture to Bernadette causes Penny to step up her game with Leonard.

episodes.name: The Proton Displacement
episodes.summary: Sheldon feels slighted when Professor Proton seeks advice from Leonard instead of him, and he seeks revenge by befriending a rival science TV host, Bill Nye. Meanwhile, Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes "girls' night".

episodes.name: The Itchy Brain Simulation
episodes.summary: Leonard tries to keep Sheldon from overreacting when a past mistake comes to light, but Sheldon punishes Leonard by making him walk a mile in his shoes. Meanwhile, Penny confronts Raj's ex-girlfriend, Lucy.

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Decoupling
episodes.summary: Sheldon protests when the gang drags him to Mrs. Wolowitz's house for Thanksgiving. Meanwhile, Penny and Leonard must deal with a mistake from her past.

episodes.name: The Discovery Dissipation
episodes.summary: Leonard and Amy help Sheldon cope with the shame he's feeling after his accidental contribution to science is disproved. Meanwhile, Raj must stay with Howard and Bernadette for a week.

episodes.name: The Cooper Extraction
episodes.summary: While Sheldon is away in Texas, everyone gathers to decorate the apartment Christmas tree, and they each realize how much he has changed their lives.

episodes.name: The Hesitation Ramification
episodes.summary: When Penny's big acting break on NCIS is a bust, Leonard struggles to help her, which results in Penny asking Leonard a bold relationship question. Meanwhile, Sheldon tries to learn how to be funny and Raj tries to work on his "game" before talking to girls.

episodes.name: The Occupation Recalibration
episodes.summary: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a vacation. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of Penny after she quits her job, and Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books.

episodes.name: The Convention Conundrum
episodes.summary: After the guys can't get Comic-Con tickets, Sheldon tries to hold his own convention and winds up spending a wild night with James Earl Jones. Meanwhile, the girls see if they can act like "grown-ups".

episodes.name: The Locomotive Manipulation
episodes.summary: Love is in the air when Sheldon and Amy join Howard and Bernadette for a trip to wine country. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny must rush Raj's dog to the vet.

episodes.name: The Table Polarization
episodes.summary: Leonard buys a dining room table and it causes Sheldon to reevaluate the changes in his life. Meanwhile, Wolowitz is offered a chance to go back to space and Bernadette struggles with whether or not to encourage him.

episodes.name: The Friendship Turbulence
episodes.summary: After the insults fly, Bernadette tries to broker the peace between Wolowitz and Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny is offered an embarrassing movie role and Raj asks Amy to write to a woman on his behalf.

episodes.name: The Mommy Observation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon visits his Mom in Houston, he is forced to confront a new reality. Meanwhile, Raj's 'Murder Mystery' party starts some fights within the gang.

episodes.name: The Indecision Amalgamation
episodes.summary: While Raj is wracked with guilt when he tries to date two women at once, Penny wrestles with whether to take a role in a cheesy movie and Sheldon is torn trying to choose between two gaming systems.

episodes.name: The Relationship Diremption
episodes.summary: Sheldon faces a personal crisis after deciding he's wasting his time with string theory. Meanwhile, a double date between Raj, Emily and the Wolowitzes ends in embarrassment for Howard.

episodes.name: The Anything Can Happen Recurrence
episodes.summary: When Sheldon tries to be spontaneous, it leads to unexpected friction between Penny, Amy and Bernadette. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howard's help in preparing for a date with Emily.

episodes.name: The Proton Transmogrification
episodes.summary: Professor Proton helps Sheldon cope with grief, while Leonard turns a relationship milestone into a competition with Penny. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette make a "Star Wars Day" gift for the guys.

episodes.name: The Gorilla Dissolution
episodes.summary: Bad day causes Penny to reevaluate her life choices - including Leonard. Meanwhile, Howard and Bernadette struggle to care for Mrs. Wolowitz, and Raj gets relationship advice from Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Status Quo Combustion
episodes.summary: Sheldon is forced to confront an uncertain future and considers a major move. Meanwhile, Raj and Emily take it to the next level, and Mrs. Wolowitz's injury is a major headache for Howard and Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Locomotion Interruption
episodes.summary: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Junior Professor Solution
episodes.summary: Sheldon is ordered to teach a class, and the gang is surprised when Howard signs up to take it; and tensions between Penny and Bernadette afford Amy an opportunity to play one against the other.

episodes.name: The First Pitch Insufficiency
episodes.summary: Wolowitz is nervous after NASA asks him to throw out the first pitch at a Los Angeles Angels game. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny try to prove Sheldon wrong after he says that he and Amy are a "superior couple".

episodes.name: The Hook-Up Reverberation
episodes.summary: Raj's honesty about his past comes back to haunt him after his girlfriend, Emily, is cold to Penny. Also, the guys consider becoming part-owners in Stuart's comic book store.

episodes.name: The Focus Attentuation
episodes.summary: Amy and Bernadette accuse Penny of being a "buzzkill" after she gets an email from work during their Vegas weekend. Meanwhile, the guys try to invent something cool, but only come up with new ways to procrastinate.

episodes.name: The Expedition Approximation
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Raj test whether they could survive a dark-matter research expedition in a salt mine by simulating the conditions in a steam tunnel. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny seek advice from Wolowitz and Bernadette after they fight about money.

episodes.name: The Misinterpretation Agitation
episodes.summary: The guys try to help Penny out of an awkward work dilemma. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette argue over whether or not female scientists should play up their sexuality.

episodes.name: The Prom Equivalency
episodes.summary: When the gang recreates a high school prom on the roof the of the guys' apartment building, Sheldon feels pressure to participate in all the typical romantic traditions.

episodes.name: The Septum Deviation
episodes.summary: When Leonard gets minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon is the one in need of sympathy. Meanwhile, Raj's parents' impending divorce causes Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage.

episodes.name: The Champagne Reflection
episodes.summary: Sheldon says a tearful goodbye to "Fun with Flags." Also, Leonard, Howard and Raj look for something significant in a dead professor's research, and Bernadette is shocked to learn her co-workers' true feelings from Penny.

episodes.name: The Clean Room Infiltration
episodes.summary: On Christmas Eve, Amy plans a traditional Victorian dinner, while Raj, Leonard and Howard scramble to remove a pigeon that flew into the clean room at the university. To prove a point to Amy, a Scrooge-like Sheldon buys her the worst possible gift.

episodes.name: The Space Probe Disintegration
episodes.summary: Wolowitz tries to distract Raj, who is anxiously awaiting data from a space probe he helped launch. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Leonard go dress shopping with Penny and Amy.

episodes.name: The Anxiety Optimization
episodes.summary: The gang tries to help Sheldon when he becomes stuck in a rut at work by increasing his anxiety level. Howard teases Raj with a new game called "Cinnamon or Emily?"

episodes.name: The Troll Manifestation
episodes.summary: After Leonard and Sheldon co-publish a physics paper, they must defend themselves against criticism from an online bully. Also, girls' night finds Penny, Amy and Bernadette confronting embarrassing moments from their past.

episodes.name: The Comic Book Store Regeneration
episodes.summary: Wolowitz receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart's comic book store. Penny teaches Sheldon how to "let it go," but can't follow her own advice after she learns something infuriating about Amy. Also, Leonard and Raj think they spot Nathan Fillion at a restaurant.

episodes.name: The Intimacy Acceleration
episodes.summary: As a joke, Sheldon and Penny try an experiment designed to make participants fall in love. Also, Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape a room with a "zombie." And, after returning from Mrs. Wolowitz' funeral, Bernadette and Howard run into trouble at the airport.

episodes.name: The Colonization Application
episodes.summary: Trouble arises when Amy learns Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonize Mars. Also, a trip to the pet store ends in a fight for Sheldon and Amy, Leonard surprises Penny with a very "adult" purchase, and, Raj is caught snooping in Emily's apartment.

episodes.name: The Leftover Thermalization
episodes.summary: Friction ensues when a magazine fails to mention Leonard in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Also, a blackout at Mrs. Wolowitz's home leads to a final family dinner in her honor.

episodes.name: The Skywalker Incursion
episodes.summary: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they take a detour to try to meet an idol. Also, when Bernadette and Howard battle over the fate of his Dr. Who TARDIS, Raj and Amy offer to settle the dispute with a game of ping pong.

episodes.name: The Fortification Implementation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to major crossroads in their relationship. Also, Wolowitz meets the half-brother he never knew he had, and when Penny is invited to appear on Wil Wheaton's podcast, she and Leonard have a huge, on-air argument.

episodes.name: The Communication Deterioration
episodes.summary: When Raj is asked to create a message in case a NASA mission discovers alien life, the guys fight over what he should do. Also, Penny is torn between auditioning for a movie or keeping her successful pharmaceutical sales job.

episodes.name: The Graduation Transmission
episodes.summary: Wolowitz questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. Meanwhile, a cancelled flight nearly prevents Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, and Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially.

episodes.name: The Maternal Combustion
episodes.summary: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet. Meanwhile, Howard finally decides to "man up" and do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends.

episodes.name: The Commitment Determination
episodes.summary: In the Season 8 finale, Leonard and Penny are pressured to set a wedding date by Sheldon, whose relationship with Amy has taken an interesting turn.

episodes.name: The Matrimonial Momentum
episodes.summary: After driving to Vegas to get married, Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another girl. Also, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy pushes pause on their relationship.

episodes.name: The Separation Oscillation
episodes.summary: Leonard confronts the woman he kissed on the North Sea in an attempt to set Penny's mind at ease. Also, Sheldon films a special episode of "Fun with Flags" after his breakup with Amy, and Bernadette feels guilty about withholding a secret from Penny.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party Corrosion
episodes.summary: The guys surprise Leonard with a belated bachelor-party weekend in Mexico, but their plans hit a bump in the road when they get a flat tire on the way. Meanwhile, the girls lean on Penny to tell her unsuspecting family that she and Leonard eloped.

episodes.name: The 2003 Approximation
episodes.summary: Sheldon learns of an impending change in his living arrangements and decides to revert back to 2003, a simpler time before he met Leonard and Penny. Also, Howard and Raj form a band to play at the Comic Book Store.

episodes.name: The Perspiration Implementation
episodes.summary: The guys take a fencing lesson from Barry Kripke and Sheldon finds himself in an awkward position when Kripke expresses interest in Amy. Also, when Stuart struggles to get female customers at the Comic Book Store, Penny, Amy and Bernadette come by to help him out.

episodes.name: The Helium Insufficiency
episodes.summary: In the midst of a nation-wide helium shortage, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to get the supplies they need. Also, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app on Amy's phone to try and find her a new man.

episodes.name: The Spock Resonance
episodes.summary: While being interviewed for a documentary about Spock from "Star Trek", Sheldon struggles to suppress his emotions about his recent break-up with Amy. Also, Wolowitz and Bernadette butt heads over remodeling his childhood home.

episodes.name: The Mystery Date Observation
episodes.summary: When Leonard, Penny and Bernadette learn that Amy is going out on a dinner date, the trio set out to spy on her and the guy. Meanwhile, Sheldon recruits Raj and Howard to find a woman for him, since they were responsible for getting Amy and him together.

episodes.name: The Platonic Permutation
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy try hanging out as friends when they spend Thanksgiving together at the aquarium. Also, Wolowitz reluctantly agrees to volunteer at the soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily, and Penny discovers that Leonard knows more about her than she thought.

episodes.name: The Earworm Reverberation
episodes.summary: Sheldon has a revelation when he realizes why a song was stuck in his head. Also, Amy invites Dave over for dinner despite their previously awkward date, and Wolowitz and Koothrappali become obsessed with a fan of their band, "Footprints on the Moon".

episodes.name: The Opening Night Excitation
episodes.summary: As the guys prepare to go to the premiere of the new Star Wars movie, Sheldon plans a special event for Amy's birthday. Also, Leonard, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket.

episodes.name: The Sales Call Sublimation
episodes.summary: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard agrees to meet with a psychiatrist on her behalf. Also, Sheldon and Koothrappali collaborate on an astronomical discovery, and Wolowitz and Bernadette can't believe what they are feeling after Stuart moves out.

episodes.name: The Empathy Optimization
episodes.summary: After having to deal with a sick Sheldon, Leonard, Penny and the gang try to treat themselves to a Sheldon-free weekend.

episodes.name: The Meemaw Materialization
episodes.summary: Sheldon's thrilled when his Meemaw comes to visit, but his excitement quickly fades when she butts heads with Amy. Also, Raj meets a new girl at the comic book store who makes him question his relationship with Emily.

episodes.name: The Valentino Submergence
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy host a live Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older, Howard and Bernadette find a surprise in their hot tub and Raj is torn between Emily and the cute girl he met at the Comic Bookstore.

episodes.name: The Positive Negative Reaction
episodes.summary: When the gang finds out about Bernadette's pregnancy, they celebrate by singing karaoke. Also, Bernadette is concerned when Wolowitz freaks out over her pregnancy announcement, and Wolowitz is convinced he must make more money to provide for the baby.

episodes.name: The Celebration Experimentation
episodes.summary: After more than nine years together, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday, surprising him with a special guest.

episodes.name: The Application Deterioration
episodes.summary: Leonard, Sheldon, and Wolowitz run into problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Also, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Koothrappali dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup.

episodes.name: The Solder Excursion Diversion
episodes.summary: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop. Also, Koothrappali sells out Leonard and Wolowitz after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie.

episodes.name: The Big Bear Precipitation
episodes.summary: Sheldon spills a secret of Leonard's when the two take a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy. Also, when Koothrappali goes overboard with pregnancy gifts, Wolowitz and Bernadette must draw the line.

episodes.name: The Viewing Party Combustion
episodes.summary: Everyone must choose sides when a small argument between Leonard and Sheldon erupts into a heated fight during a group get-together.

episodes.name: The Fermentation Bifurcation
episodes.summary: The gang goes to a wine bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend, Zack. Also, Bernadette gets stuck spending the evening with Sheldon when she can't go wine tasting with the group, and things don't go as planned when Koothrappali introduces his new girlfriend, Claire.

episodes.name: The Line Substitution Solution
episodes.summary: Sheldon hires Stuart to spend the day with Amy when he'd rather go to a movie screening. Also, Leonard's mother, Beverly, comes to town and Penny struggles to make a connection with her.

episodes.name: The Convergence Convergence
episodes.summary: Chaos ensues when Leonard's recently divorced parents, Alfred and Beverly, and Sheldon's devoutly religious mother, Mary, come to town. Also, Wolowitz and Koothrappali think the government is out to get them when they are contacted about their guidance system.

episodes.name: The Conjugal Conjecture
episodes.summary: After Sheldon's mother and Leonard's father share an evening together, everyone deals with an awkward morning the following day. Also, Penny's family arrives for the ceremony, including her anxiety-ridden mother, Susan, and her drug dealing brother, Randall.

episodes.name: The Military Miniaturization
episodes.summary: Colonel Williams, an Air Force representative from the Department of Material Command sits down to talk with Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Dependence Transcendence
episodes.summary: Tensions rise when the boys struggle to complete their government project on time and Sheldon tries an energy drink to stay awake. Also, Penny and Amy go to a "party" at Bert the geologist's house, and Kooothrappali learns Bernadette's true feelings about her pregnancy when they clean out the future baby room.

episodes.name: The Cohabitation Experimentation
episodes.summary: When Amy's apartment floods, she proposes a "cohabitation experiment" with Sheldon. Also, Howard and Bernadette are upset when Koothrappali learns the gender of the baby before they do.

episodes.name: The Hot Tub Contamination
episodes.summary: Leonard and Penny must separate a quarreling Sheldon and Amy when their cohabitation does not go as planned, and Sheldon threatens to break off their relationship when Amy refuses to adhere to the bathroom schedule. Also, Howard and Bernadette find unexpected guests at their house when they decide to stay home from a planned vacation.

episodes.name: The Fetal Kick Catalyst
episodes.summary: Penny is surprised to learn she has fans of her performance in "Serial Ape-ist" when she attends Van Nuys Comic Con with Leonard. Also, Amy hosts a Sheldon-style brunch at Penny's apartment, and Wolowitz makes an impulsive purchase when he starts stressing out about the baby on the way.

episodes.name: The Veracity Elasticity
episodes.summary: In order to continue living with Sheldon, Amy lies to him about repairs being made to her apartment and they host an "on location" episode of "Fun With Flags" in Penny's apartment. Also, Leonard lets Penny decorate Sheldon's old room after he learns that she has been secretly moving Leonard's collectibles into storage.

episodes.name: The Brain Bowl Incubation
episodes.summary: After a successful experiment combining their genes, Sheldon will stop at nothing to convince Amy they should procreate. Also, Koothrappali is embarrassed to tell the gang what the new woman he's dating does for a living.

episodes.name: The Geology Elevation
episodes.summary: When Bert, a Caltech geologist, wins the MacArthur Genius fellowship, Sheldon is overcome with jealousy. Also, Wolowitz finds an old remote control Stephen Hawking action figure he invented.

episodes.name: The Property Division Collision
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Leonard must divide up their possessions and remove Penny's things from 4B.

episodes.name: The Birthday Synchronicity
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy attempt to have an intimate moment together to celebrate Amy's birthday; Bernadette and Wolowitz welcome their newborn baby to the world.

episodes.name: The Holiday Summation
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy visit Leonard and Penny for the first time since the holidays and share details about their terrible trip to Texas.

episodes.name: The Romance Recalibration
episodes.summary: Leonard and Penny ask for Sheldon's and Amy's help on putting the romance back in their marriage. Howard and Raj go to extreme lengths to stop the floor in Halley's bedroom from making noise.

episodes.name: The Emotion Detection Automation
episodes.summary: Sheldon beta tests an MIT invention after hearing it can help him read people's emotions. Also, Leonard can't hide his feelings when Penny announces her brother is coming to town and Raj invites his ex-girlfriends over to give him dating advice.

episodes.name: The Locomotion Reverberation
episodes.summary: Leonard and Wolowitz try to distract Sheldon when he slows the progress of their guidance system. Also, Penny and Amy take Bernadette out for the night, leaving Raj and Stuart to care for baby Halley.

episodes.name: The Allowance Evaporation
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy have their first fight since moving in together, and Koothrappali is shocked at the realities of financial independence when he stops receiving support from his father.

episodes.name: The Comic-Con Conundrum
episodes.summary: With Koothrappali cut off from his father's fortune, he appoints Sheldon to help him get out of debt. Also, Penny considers joining Leonard at Comic-Con.

episodes.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
episodes.summary: When Raj moves out of his apartment, Leonard and Penny offer him Sheldon's old room.

episodes.name: The Collaboration Fluctuation
episodes.summary: Leonard, Penny and Raj adjust to their new living arrangement, and Sheldon takes an interest in Amy's work.

episodes.name: The Recollection Dissipation
episodes.summary: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on projects with Leonard and Wolowitz as well as Amy on the same day. Also, Bernadette is nearing the end of her maternity leave and must return to work.

episodes.name: The Separation Agitation
episodes.summary: Howard and Bernadette have a hard time leaving Halley in day care when Bernadette returns to work. Also, Bert introduces the gang to his new girlfriend, Rebecca.

episodes.name: The Cognition Regeneration
episodes.summary: Leonard isn't thrilled when Penny considers taking a new job offered by her ex-boyfriend, Zack.

episodes.name: The Gyroscopic Collapse
episodes.summary: After Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz celebrate the completion of the top secret air force project, they are met with an unpleasant surprise. Also, Amy is offered a summer position as a visiting researcher.

episodes.name: The Long Distance Dissonance
episodes.summary: The gang is concerned when Sheldon's former admirer, Dr. Ramona Nowitzki, resurfaces while Amy is away at Princeton.

episodes.name: The Proposal Proposal
episodes.summary: Amy gives Sheldon an answer to his proposal while Howard and Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

episodes.name: The Retraction Reaction
episodes.summary: Leonard angers the university – and the entire physics community – after he gives an embarrassing interview. Also, Amy and Bernadette bond over having to hide their success from Sheldon and Howard.

episodes.name: The Relaxation Integration
episodes.summary: As Sheldon stresses about picking a wedding date, Amy tries to convince him he has a more laid-back side. Also, Koothrappali and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's new coworker, Ruchi.

episodes.name: The Explosion Implosion
episodes.summary: Howard and Sheldon bond when they drive to the desert to shoot off a model rocket. Also, when Leonard's mom, Beverly, finds a new best friend in Penny, it rubs Leonard the wrong way.

episodes.name: The Collaboration Contamination
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Koothrappali confide in Bernadette when they can't handle Amy and Wolowitz working together. Also, Penny and Leonard learn new tactics for how to deal Sheldon from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: The Proton Regeneration
episodes.summary: Sheldon goes head-to-head with Wil Wheaton for the role of the new Professor Proton. Also, Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette and Wolowitz both wind up on bed rest.

episodes.name: The Geology Methodology
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, despite Sheldon's embarrassment. Also, Penny and Bernadette coach Koothrappali on how to navigate his relationship with Ruchi.

episodes.name: The Tesla Recoil
episodes.summary: Leonard and Wolowitz are furious after they learn Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Also, while Bernadette is on bed rest, she asks Raj to do some digging when she suspects Ruchi is trying to steal her job.

episodes.name: The Bitcoin Entanglement
episodes.summary: Sheldon tries to teach the guys a lesson after they cut him out of a potentially valuable Bitcoin investment. Also, a seven-year-old video reveals a secret about Leonard and Penny's relationship.

episodes.name: The Confidence Erosion
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy try to eliminate stress from wedding planning by applying math to the process. Also, Koothrappali "breaks up" with Wolowitz after realizing his best friend is actually hurting his confidence.

episodes.name: The Celebration Reverberation
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Wolowitz plan birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley, respectively. Also, Leonard receives a Christmas letter from his brother that causes him to spiral out about his own lack of accomplishments.

episodes.name: The Matrimonial Metric
episodes.summary: To discover who would be most qualified to be best man and maid of honor at their wedding, Sheldon and Amy subject their friends to a series of secret experiments. Also, Penny reveals her true feelings about Amy.

episodes.name: The Solo Oscillation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon kicks Amy out to work solo, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Also, Bert the geologist replaces Wolowitz in the band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny a surprising source of scientific inspiration.

episodes.name: The Separation Triangulation
episodes.summary: Koothrappali finds himself in the middle of domestic drama when he learns the woman he's dating, Nell, has a very upset husband, Oliver. Also, when Sheldon rents his old room back for a quiet place to work, he drives Leonard crazy by being a model tenant.

episodes.name: The Novelization Correlation
episodes.summary: When Sheldon petitions Wil Wheaton to appear on the new Professor Proton show, Wil offers a role to Amy instead. Also, Penny gets angry when she thinks the female protagonist in Leonard's novel is based on her.

episodes.name: The Neonatal Nomenclature
episodes.summary: When Bernadette won't go into labor, all her friends try different tactics to get things started. Also, Wolowitz confronts Bernadette after Amy accidentally reveals she's already chosen their son's name.

episodes.name: The Athenaeum Allocation
episodes.summary: Leonard jumps through hoops to help secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy. Also, Bernadette and Wolowitz have a hard time deciding who should stay at home with the kids and who should go back to work.

episodes.name: The Gates Excitation
episodes.summary: Penny gets the opportunity to host Bill Gates at work when his company wants to partner with her pharmaceutical company. Also, Leonard, Koothrappali and Wolowitz do everything in their power to meet him, while Sheldon thinks he is the victim of an April Fools prank.

episodes.name: The Tenant Disassociation
episodes.summary: When Leonard learns Sheldon is the president of the tenants association, he decides to run against him. Also, Bernadette encourages Wolowitz and Koothrappali to find the owner of a drone after they find it in the backyard.

episodes.name: The Reclusive Potential
episodes.summary: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Doctor Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, and Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Also, Penny and Bernadette improvise after Amy doesn't like the tame bachelorette party they planned for her.

episodes.name: The Comet Polarization
episodes.summary: Sheldon's comic book store experiences changes when writer Neil Gaiman puts Stuart's store on the map. Also, Koothrappali takes credit for Penny's astronomical discovery, and friendships are threatened.

episodes.name: The Monetary Insufficiency
episodes.summary: Sheldon goes to Vegas to win money for science. Also, Penny and Bernadette take Amy wedding dress shopping, but her terrible choice entangles them in a web of lies.

episodes.name: The Sibling Realignment
episodes.summary: When Sheldon learns that his mother won't attend his wedding unless he invites his brother, Georgie, he and Leonard travel to Texas to end a family feud. Also, the Wolowitz kids inadvertently infest Amy, Bernadette, Wolowitz and Koothrappali with pinkeye.

episodes.name: The Bow Tie Asymmetry
episodes.summary: Amy and Sheldon's wedding provides Sheldon with the information he needs to make a breakthrough in his symmetrical string theory. Meanwhile, their friends pick up Sheldon and Amy's families from the airport, and Mark Hamill agrees to officiate at the ceremony.

episodes.name: The Conjugal Configuration
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York, while Penny and Leonard discover they are uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents, Mr. and Mrs. Fowler. Also, Koothrappali insults physicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and starts a Twitter war.

episodes.name: The Wedding Gift Wormhole
episodes.summary: Sheldon and Amy drive themselves crazy trying to figure out what "perfect gift" Leonard and Penny gave them for their wedding. Also, Koothrappali decides he wants to settle down and asks his father to arrange a marriage for him.

episodes.name: The Procreation Calculation
episodes.summary: The Wolowitzes' life gets complicated when Stuart starts bringing his new girlfriend home. Also, Penny and Leonard talk about starting a family while Koothrappali explores an arranged marriage.

episodes.name: The Tam Turbulence
episodes.summary: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned Tam, his childhood best friend, Leonard takes matters into his own hands. Also, Bernadette and Penny take out Raj's fiancée, Anu, for dinner to get the skinny on her.

episodes.name: The Planetarium Collision
episodes.summary: When Amy doesn't have time to work on super-asymmetry, Sheldon goes to great lengths to ensure she's available to work with him even it if means accidentally sabotaging her career in the process. Also, Koothrappali doesn't want Wolowitz to join him in hosting a show at the planetarium.

episodes.name: The Imitation Perturbation
episodes.summary: When Wolowitz dresses up as Sheldon for Halloween, Sheldon seeks retaliation at Leonard and Penny's Halloween party. Also, Leonard is shocked that Penny doesn't remember their first kiss.

episodes.name: The Grant Allocation Derivation
episodes.summary: Leonard is caught between a rock and a hard place when he's responsible for distributing extra grant money. Also, Bernadette turns the backyard playhouse into a hideaway from her husband and kids.

episodes.name: The Consummation Deviation
episodes.summary: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's father, but when Wolowitz lures Mr. Fowler away with magic tricks, Sheldon has no choice but to bond with Mrs. Fowler. Also, Koothrappali and Anu try to get physical for the first time.

movies.name: Black Mirror
movies.summary: Over the last ten years, technology has transformed almost every aspect of our lives before we've had time to stop and question it. In every home; on every desk; in every palm - a plasma screen; a monitor; a smartphone--a black mirror of our 21st Century existence. Black Mirror is a contemporary British re-working of The Twilight Zone with stories that tap into the collective unease about our modern world.

episodes.name: The National Anthem
episodes.summary: Prime Minister Michael Callow faces a huge and shocking dilemma when Princess Susannah, a much-loved member of the Royal Family, is kidnapped.

episodes.name: Fifteen Million Merits
episodes.summary: In the near future, everyone is confined to a life of strange physical drudgery. The only way to escape is to enter the 'Hot Shot' talent show and pray you can impress the judges.

episodes.name: The Entire History of You
episodes.summary: A jealous husband, Liam Foxwell, suspects that his wife was involved with another man. Thanks to an implant that lets anyone play memories back as long and as often as they want, he sets out to confirm his suspicions.

episodes.name: Be Right Back
episodes.summary: When a man named Ash dies, his girlfriend Martha is grief-stricken... until a friend directs her to a service that can create an AI programmed with Ash's online personality. Eventually the software offers Martha a new improvement: a physical body for it to occupy.

episodes.name: White Bear
episodes.summary: A woman, Victoria, wakes up with amnesia and a fellow survivor tells her that nine-tenths of the world's population have been turned into photo-taking zombies by a mysterious TV signal. To get to safety, they have to evade the sadistic hunters and destroy the White Bear transmitter. However, Victoria soon realizes that something far more sinister is going on.

episodes.name: The Waldo Moment
episodes.summary: An animated blue bear, Waldo, proves surprisingly successful as a third-party candidate. But Jamie Salter, the voice of Waldo, begins to have second thoughts when he learns what the governments of the world intend to use Waldo for.

episodes.name: Nosedive
episodes.summary: In the near future, everyone is obsessed with getting ratings from others... and a woman, Lacie, is determined to get a high enough rating to buy the home she's always dreamed of.

episodes.name: Playtest
episodes.summary: An American, Cooper, leaves the States to avoid facing his mother after the death of his father. Trying to raise money, he signs up to playtest a new VR game for a cutting-edge company and gets more than he expected.

episodes.name: Shut Up and Dance
episodes.summary: Hackers get a compromising video of a teenager, Kenny, and force him and their other blackmail victims to complete an elaborate and increasingly dangerous series of tasks.

episodes.name: San Junipero
episodes.summary: A woman named Yorkie arrives in the 1987 town of San Junipero, and soon links up with the free-spirited Kelly. But San Junipero isn't all that it seems...

episodes.name: Men Against Fire
episodes.summary: A soldier, Stripe, serves in Europe hunting down mutated humans known as "Roaches." However, he soon discovers that the creatures aren't what they appear.

episodes.name: Hated in the Nation
episodes.summary: A DIC and her new shadow investigate a reporter's death and discover that she was the most hated woman in the UK by popular vote... and the vote killed her.

episodes.name: USS Callister
episodes.summary: A new recruit aboard the Space Fleet cruiser USS Callister soon discovers that she's not real... and neither is anything else.

episodes.name: Arkangel
episodes.summary: An overprotective mother has a chip installed in her daughter's head that lets her monitor everything she sees and hears, but takes it too far.

episodes.name: Crocodile
episodes.summary: An old friend of architect Mia Nolan tells her that he's going to confess to a crime that they both commited 15 years ago. Mia is forced to silence him and then anyone who might tie her to the crime.

episodes.name: Hang the DJ
episodes.summary: A mysterious "System" pairs up couples and sets expiry dates on their relationships, but one couple decides to rebel.

episodes.name: Metalhead
episodes.summary: In a post-apocalyptic England, three scavengers break into a warehouse. Two of them are killed by a robot "dog" drone, which relentlessly hunts the survivor.

episodes.name: Black Museum
episodes.summary: A woman, Nish, stops at Rolo Haynes' World Famous Black Museum, and Rolo is glad to show her the technological crime oddities that he's collected.

movies.name: Rick and Morty
movies.summary: Rick is a mentally gifted, but sociopathic and alcoholic scientist and a grandfather to Morty; an awkward, impressionable, and somewhat spineless teenage boy. Rick moves into the family home of Morty, where he immediately becomes a bad influence.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: Rick takes Morty to another dimension to get some seeds for him but Morty's parents are considering to put Rick in a retirement home for keeping Morty away from school to help him in his lab.

episodes.name: Lawnmower Dog
episodes.summary: Morty's small, white dog Snuffles gets on the nerves of the family, so Rick quickly builds a knowledge enhancing helmet for the dog. In the meantime, Rick and Morty decide to incept the dreams of Morty's math teacher, Mr. Goldenfold in order to convince him to give Morty A's in math. While the duo are sent on an epic dream world journey, Snuffles slowly gains sentience, which leads to a slew of even more problems.

episodes.name: Anatomy Park
episodes.summary: It's around Christmas time and Jerry's parents are coming to visit so he wants everybody to have a normal holiday without technology and without Rick. Fortunately for him, Rick has other plans, involving building a molecular theme park inside of a friend of his named Ruben, and he shrinks down Morty and sends him in there to test it out.

episodes.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery in this M. Night Shyamalan style twistaroony of an episode.

episodes.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
episodes.summary: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty. Sounds good, better record this one, broh!

episodes.name: Rick Potion #9
episodes.summary: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get Jessica. The serum backfires & Rick's attempt to fix things creates Cronenberg inspired monsters. Rick is okay with it but Morty feels partly responsible for creating a living nightmare.

episodes.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
episodes.summary: Morty convinces Rick to buy him a sexy robot. Guess what tho? Trouble happens, dog.

episodes.name: Rixty Minutes
episodes.summary: When Rick hooks up the family's tv receiver with reality-tv shows from alternate dimensions, and allows them to see themselves in different versions of their lives, they begin to wonder what they have, and more importantly - what could have been.

episodes.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
episodes.summary: Rick goes to battle with the devil, and Summer gets upset about it, broh. Plus Jerry and Morty hang out, broh!

episodes.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
episodes.summary: Rick has a run in with some old associates, resulting in a fallout with Morty. You got any chips, broh?

episodes.name: Ricksy Business
episodes.summary: Beth and Jerry head for an iceberg of a date leaving Rick in charge. Morty doesn't get to go on any more adventures if the house isn't in the same condition when they get back.

episodes.name: A Rickle in Time
episodes.summary: Rick don goofed this time and mussed up the whole time frame broh! Beth and Jerry get romantic!

episodes.name: Mortynight Run
episodes.summary: Morty tries to save a life.

episodes.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
episodes.summary: Rick becomes emotional; Beth and Jerry are hard on each other.

episodes.name: Total Rickall
episodes.summary: Meeting new friends; Morty goes ballistic.

episodes.name: Get Schwifty
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty must step up and save things; a new religion starts up.

episodes.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
episodes.summary: Rick forgets to check his oil, and must repair his car.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
episodes.summary: Rick joins in on hijinks, Beth and Jerry sort out relationship issues.

episodes.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
episodes.summary: Jerry gets sick and Rick sparks up the TV.

episodes.name: Look Who's Purging Now
episodes.summary: Morty makes a mistake and Jerry and Summer work on their father daughter relationship.

episodes.name: The Wedding Squanchers
episodes.summary: Birdperson is getting married and invites the Smith family to the wedding.

episodes.name: The Rickshank Rickdemption
episodes.summary: Rick, still in galactic prison, puts an intricate escape plan into action. Back on Earth, which is now under federation control, Morty and Summer have an argument about their grandpa.

episodes.name: Rickmancing the Stone
episodes.summary: With the kids dealing with their parents' divorce, Rick takes them to a Mad Max-style universe where he tries to steal a green crystal from a group of scavengers.

episodes.name: Pickle Rick
episodes.summary: Rick turns himself into a pickle in one of his crazy experiments. The Smith family attends therapy.

episodes.name: Vindicators 3: The Return of Worldender
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty are summoned by the Vindicators to stop Worldender but end up in a deathtrap conceived by Drunk Rick.

episodes.name: The Whirly Dirly Conspiracy
episodes.summary: Rick takes Jerry on a sympathy adventure to a resort where everyone is immortal when there, and Jerry meets some old acquaintances of Rick's who want payback.

episodes.name: Rest and Ricklaxation
episodes.summary: Following a stressful adventure, Rick and Morty go on a break to a spa where they remove their toxins, which in turn take a form of their own.

episodes.name: The Ricklantis Mixup
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty head to Atlantis. Meanwhile, the Citadel of Ricks undergoes major changes under new leadership

episodes.name: Morty's Mind Blowers
episodes.summary: Rick reveals to Morty his "Morty's mind blowers," a collection of memories Morty asked Rick to erase from his mind.

episodes.name: The ABC's of Beth
episodes.summary: Jerry is lucky with a lady and Beth recalls her childhood.

episodes.name: The Rickchurian Mortydate
episodes.summary: Rick goes on a confrontation with the President.

movies.name: Westworld
movies.summary: Westworld is a dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin. Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, it explores a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged.

episodes.name: The Original
episodes.summary: A woman named Dolores is a free spirit in the Old West... and unaware that she's actually an android, programmed to entertain rich guests seeking to act out their fantasies in an idealized vision of the 1880s. However, the people in charge soon realize that their androids are acting in ways that they didn't anticipate.

episodes.name: Chestnut
episodes.summary: Bernard suspects that someone is sabotaging the hosts. Meanwhile, the Man continues his search for the deeper game, and Maeve finds herself in a world of hurt... literally.

episodes.name: The Stray
episodes.summary: Bernard continues to investigate Dolores' supposed malfunction, and realizes that he has something unexpected on his hands. Meanwhile, Robert talks about the early days of the park, and Teddy receives a new role and narrative.

episodes.name: Dissonance Theory
episodes.summary: While Dolores joins William and Logan on their adventure, the Man in Black continues his search for the entrance to the Maze and meets Armistice. Meanwhile, Robert reveals some of his true power to Theresa and advises her to stay out of his way.

episodes.name: Contrapasso
episodes.summary: Dolores takes the first step on her path of discovery by deciding to write a new story for herself... where she isn't the damsel. Meanwhile, Elise discovers the Woodcutter's secret, and Robert pays the Man a visit.

episodes.name: The Adversary
episodes.summary: While Maeve convinces Felix to show her "upstairs," Teddy and the Man close in on the maze. Meanwhile, Bernard and Elsie close in on the identity of the person who is stealing secrets from the park, while Lee meets with a Delos executive director.

episodes.name: Trompe L'Oeil
episodes.summary: While William and Dolores travel to the unclaimed territories, Charlotte and Theresa make plans to force Robert out of the park using Clementine. Meanwhile, Maeve continues her plans to escape Westworld.

episodes.name: Trace Decay
episodes.summary: Bernard tries to cope with what he did under Robert's orders. Meanwhile, William and Dolores find a town, and Maeve remembers more of her past. Meanwhile, the Man reveals his past to Teddy.

episodes.name: The Well-Tempered Clavier
episodes.summary: Bernard forces Robert to take him back into his own memories, while the Man meets with Charlotte. Meanwhile, Dolores escapes the Confederado camp and William gives Logan new orders.

episodes.name: The Bicameral Mind
episodes.summary: Delores finds out the truth about William's fate. Meanwhile, Maeve organizes an escape plan, only to discover that someone else is pulling the strings. And Robert plays the final piece in his grand narrative.

episodes.name: Journey Into Night
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of the host rebellion, the rescue team finds Bernard and the new Head of Operations asks for his help. Meanwhile, Delores promises to show Teddy the truth, and Maeve convinces Lee and Hector to help her find her daughter.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.summary: Dolores looks for allies sympathetic to her cause and shows Teddy the truth of his existence. In the past, Dolores gets her first taste of the outside world and William shows her a weapon of mass destruction.

episodes.name: Virtù e Fortuna
episodes.summary: While Delores makes a deal with the Confederados, Maeve and her group find Felix and Sylvester. Meanwhile, a new Guest comes to Westworld, and Bernard has a meeting of minds with Peter.

episodes.name: The Riddle of the Sphinx
episodes.summary: William pays his recuperating father-in-law several visits. Meanwhile, the Man continues to play Robert's game, and Bernard remembers some of his missing time.

episodes.name: Akane No Mai
episodes.summary: While Maeve and her people explore Shogun World, Delores realizes that the Teddy she knows can't be a part of the new world coming.

episodes.name: Phase Space
episodes.summary: Maeve finds her daughter, Delores finds the "real" Teddy, Grace finds her father, and Charlotte and Stubbs find Peter.

episodes.name: Les Écorchés
episodes.summary: Charlotte and Bernard review Bernard's memories to discover what happened to the missing control unit. Meanwhile, Robert has a chat with Bernard, and Maeve confronts her former tormentor.

episodes.name: Kiksuya
episodes.summary: Another of Westworld's Host revolutionaries is revealed. Meanwhile, Emily finds the Man and convinces the Ghost Nation to hand him over to her to ensure his suffering.

episodes.name: Vanishing Point
episodes.summary: The Man learns that his grip on reality isn't what he thought, as he considers how his wife died. Meanwhile, Dolores continues her trek across the park to the Valley Beyond, and Bernard receives another visit from Robert.

episodes.name: The Passenger
episodes.summary: The Man faces a personal reckoning, while Akecheta and the others find the door. Meanwhile, Bernard meets with Robert one last time after choosing how to deal with Dolores.
